field.value:
The page http://www.castleproject.org/activerecord/documentation/trunk/usersguide/scopes.html says that you can find more on TransactionScope at http://www.castleproject.org/activerecord/documentation/trunk/manual/scopes.html .
All there is mentioned about it is "TransactionMode: Defines the scope of a transaction. Can be nested within a SessionScope and even between multiple transactions."
Should we really link to this page?
The reason for my question is that I just wanted to add the information, that a TransactionScope decides on Dispose whether it should commit or rollback based on the votes and the OnDispose mode. I only found this information in the sources, so I thought it should be added somewhere. Where?
Thanks,
Flo

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: Florian, you can create a patch for documentation that adds a new page about scopes with all the information you wanted to add.
